sentences.cn: “ 有一点奇怪”绝对是轻描淡写.

sentences.en: ‘It wasn’t very easy to find the house.’ ‘That’s got to be the understatement of the year!’
sentences.cn: “这房子不是很好找。” “那可是说得太轻了！”

sentences.en: "We both have an interesting 10 days coming up," said Alex Ferguson with studied understatement.
sentences.cn: 亚历克斯·弗格森故作轻描淡写地说：“我们都即将迎来愉快的10天。”

sentences.en: He informed us with massive understatement that he was feeling disappointed.
sentences.cn: 他极力轻描淡写地跟我们说他感到失望。

sentences.en: He was getting very hard to live with, and that's the understatement of the year.
sentences.cn: 说他很不好相处，那简直是说得太客气了。

sentences.en: Hyperbole and understatement are two chief rhetorical figures in English language.
sentences.cn: 夸张与含蓄陈述是英语中两种主要的修辞手段.

sentences.en: It is a hopeless understatement to say that I am deeply grateful.
sentences.cn: 只是一句“我深深地感谢”远不足以表达我的谢意.

sentences.en: Like all craftsmen, hackers like good tools . Infact , that's an understatement.
sentences.cn: 就像所有的手艺人那样, 黑客最喜欢的是好的工具.

sentences.en: To say he wasn't amused must be the understatement of the year.
sentences.cn: 说他不感兴趣肯定说轻了.

sentences.en: To say I'm disappointed is an understatement.
sentences.cn: 说我失望那是说得太轻了。

sentences.en: To say that he was displeased is an understatement, ie He was furious.
sentences.cn: 说他不高兴是重事轻说(他已怒不可遏).

sentences.en: To say the movie was bad is an understatement.
sentences.cn: 说这部电影不好还算是客气的。

sentences.en: To say they come in all shapes and sizes is an understatement.
sentences.cn: 如果说它们形状各异,大小不同一点没夸张.

sentences.en: Understatement is always the absolute best way to put forth earth - shaking ideas.
sentences.cn: 轻描淡写是提出重大思想的绝好方法.

sentences.en: Whatever we can look forward to, do not expect understatement.
sentences.cn: 不管我们期待看到什么, 都别期待保守的表现方式就对了.

sentences.en: When I said you were remarkable, that was an understatement.
sentences.cn: 我说你很神奇, 其实我觉得这还不够.

sentences.en: With regards to optics, the Abt AS 8 communicates pure understatement.
sentences.cn: 对于以光学技术, 阿布特AS8通信纯轻描淡写.
